name: Mission Mars (itch) (realyelow)
description:
Mission mars is a project i am working on where you have been asked to fly to mars to collect data so mars city can be started, you will scout the land of mars and bring back data to earth,

the game is NOT FINSIHED YET AT ALL this is only a prototype version and will completely change throughout time, the current rocket launch is a place holder and will be worked on and replaced eventually

Newest Update-

Menu removed due to bugs

Bug fixes next update-

fixing game not starting when entering the id

Upcoming Updates-

Making it possible to go to other planets(mars first)

Mars Terrain is being worked on(look at game screenshots)

Mars rovers beginning development
